metadata.title: CVE-2021-47543 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: perfreport: Fix memory leaks around perf_tip() perf_tip() may allocate memoryor use a literal, this means memory wasn't freed if allocated. Change theAPI so that literals aren't used. At the same time add missing frees forsystem_path. These issues were spotted using leak sanitizer.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
